title: Yongquan Temple Vegetarian Restaurant
description: Hike, take the cable car or drive to the restaurant. A beautiful place serves vegetarian food as well as fresh flowers and herbs teas in a pot that has a 2-foot long spout. Order dinners based on your party size and appetite, and servers will you a variety of appetizers and entrees, some of which are made from tofu and gluten. Chinese Name: 鼓山涌泉寺 回龙阁素菜馆. 素馨斋 Chinese Address: 鼓山风景区涌泉寺内.
